long_description: Whether you're riding a road or mountain bike, this rear, rack-mounted storage bag from Topeak is great for commuting, errands and touring. MTX TrunkBag EX attaches to your bike via a Topeak MTX QuickTrack(TM) rear rack system, sold separately. Features divided main compartment, 2 side pockets and multifunctional top pocket. Includes shoulder carrying strap. Comes with built-in carry handle and detachable shoulder strap. Reflective detailing increases your visibility in low light; includes an adjustable bungee cord on top and rear-light webbing clip in back.
short_description: Whether you're riding a road or mountain bike, this rear, rack-mounted storage bag from Topeak is great for commuting, errands and touring.
